markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pride Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5554) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=746" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 10 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You avoid the attention of creatures focused on your allies. You can use [lesser cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) from your allies to [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=2404).
name: Pride Hunter
